roleset.name: work towards a goal
roleset.note: BARNSTORM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'barnstorm' based on ebn instances. (from barnstorm.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: way to rhyme
example.text: As part of his *PRO* Barnstorm for Reform tour, he is joined by Republican governers from Connecticut, South Dakota, and Montana.
